channel.title: orm on My Digital Garden
channel.description: Recent content in orm on My Digital Garden

item.title: Active Record vs. Data Mapper: Navigating PHP ORM Patterns with Eloquent and Doctrine
item.description: Comparing and contrasting the Active Record and Data Mapper patterns, as implemented in PHP by Eloquent and Doctrine ORM respectively, highlighting their different approaches to managing data persistence and the pros and cons of each.
